page.title: 15RECREATION IN DEERNESS (1)
page.content: During the summer a men's{soccer}team takes part in competitions at parish and league levels. The younger women combine with the adjoining parish to play{hockey}and those who play {badminton}must do likewise. Many of the young girls are keen participators in all events held by the district's {Pony Club.}During winter there are facilities available in the Parish Hall for playing{table tennis, carpet {bowls, darts and pool.}Here, also, some senior citizens revive the almost forgotten{dances}from their youth. The young people also enjoy the {discos}where there is plenty of loud up to date music and flashing lights. Many keen{gardeners}in the Parish take a pride in beautifying their gardens and surrounding roadsides, besides growing indoor plants.
